card.title: Description
card.content:
With this button you can
- import a protein structure from an existing .pdb file - import a protein structure with a PDB id.

guide.title: Import a protein structure from an existing .pdb file

steps.step: Click on :google_material-upload_file_w200:, to open a new dialog window.
In the new dialog, click on the three dots.
In the file dialog choose an existing .pdb file from your computer.

guide.title: Import a protein structure using a PDB id

steps.step: Click on :google_material-upload_file_w200:, to open a new dialog window.
In the new dialog, enter the PDB id into the text field.
